data.title: Scarface: The World Is Yours
data.text:
Install SilentPatch.

Start the game and most common resolutions should be available now in the in-game graphics menu.

Notes

In case of boot issues or desired resolution not being available in-game, set custom resolution in <path-to-game>\settings.ini instead by adjusting the ScreenHeight and ScreenHeight (create these values if they don't exist yet) to the desired resolution.

Install SilentPatch.

Start the game once for the settings file to be created.

Set custom FOV in <path-to-game>\settings.ini by adjusting the FOV value (create the value if it does not exist yet) to the desired FOV value.

Install SilentPatch.

Set CameraSpeedMultiplier value (create this value if they don't exist yet) in <path-to-game>\settings.ini to the desired float value.[16].

Download and extract dgVoodoo 2.

Copy D3D9.dll from the MS\x86\ folder to the game folder.

Run dgVoodoo, and add the game folder to the list.

Enable the Enumerate refresh rates option.

Go to the DirectX tab, and set the desired resolution (e.g. 1920x1080, 119Hz).

(Optional) Disable the dgVoodoo Watermark option to prevent the dgVoodoo logo from showing on game launch.

Click OK to apply changes.
